Class Ninja

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Troops
        • Ninja
  • public class Ninja
extends Troops
    Ninja is a troop that has low health, high damage, very high speed It has the special ability to turn invulnerable when not attacking
    Version:
    April 2020
    Author:
    Stanley Wang

      • Ninja

        public Ninja​(boolean isRed)
        Create a Ninja with specified team.
        Parameters:
        isRed - True if red team, false if blue team.

      • Ninja

        public Ninja​(boolean isRed,
             int hp,
             int speed,
             int damage,
             int sight)
        Create a Ninja of the specified team, with specified hp, speed, damage, and sight range.
        Parameters:
        isRed - True if red team, false if blue team.
        hp - HP the ninja starts with.
        speed - Speed the ninja marches downt the battlefield.
        damage - Damage the ninja's projectiles deal.
        sight - Sight range of the ninja.

      • Ninja

        public Ninja​(boolean isRed,
             int hp,
             int maxHp,
             int speed,
             int damage,
             int sight)
        Create a Ninja of the specified team, with specified current hp, max hp, speed, damage, and sight range.
        Parameters:
        isRed - True if red team, false if blue team.
        hp - HP the ninja starts with.
        maxHp - MaxHP of the ninja.
        speed - Speed the ninja marches downt the battlefield.
        damage - Damage the ninja's projectiles deal.
        sight - Sight range of the ninja.
